title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Educational Design for Enhancing Computational Thinking in Science

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of elementary scientific theories and technical application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can structure and solve scientific problems using a computational thinking framework.
Learners can visually represent experimental results using data analysis and simulation tools.
Learners can analyze the social impact of technology and write project reports reflecting ethical considerations.
Learners can design and execute team-based science projects using collaboration tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
